mapper.sql: job_id, job_name, company_id, job_hiringNum, job_applicantNum, job_endDate, job_state
mapper.select: select job_id, job_name, tb_job.company_id, job_hiringNum, job_applicantNum, job_endDate, job_state, COMPANY_NAME from tb_job join qit.tb_company tc on tb_job.company_id = tc.COMPANY_ID where job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select job_id, job_name, tb_job.company_id, job_hiringNum, job_applicantNum, job_endDate, job_state, COMPANY_NAME from tb_job join qit.tb_company tc on tb_job.company_id = tc.COMPANY_ID
tb_job.company_id = #{companyId} and
tb_job.job_name like concat('%', #{selectName}, '%')
select job_id, job_name, tb_job.company_id, job_hiringNum, job_applicantNum, job_endDate, job_state, COMPANY_NAME from tb_job join qit.tb_company tc on tb_job.company_id = tc.COMPANY_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_job
job_name,
company_id,
job_hiringNum,
job_applicantNum,
job_endDate,
job_state,

mapper.update:
update tb_job
job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_hiringNum = #{jobHiringnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_applicantNum = #{jobApplicantnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_endDate = #{jobEnddate,jdbcType=DATE},
job_state = #{jobState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_job set job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_hiringNum = #{jobHiringnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_applicantNum = #{jobApplicantnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_endDate = #{jobEnddate,jdbcType=DATE}, job_state = #{jobState,jdbcType=TINYINT} where job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
